policy_name: Authenticated users can insert their own comments

using_expression:
(EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM conversation_members m
  WHERE ((m.conversation_id = conversations.id) AND (m.user_id = auth.uid()))))

  WHERE ((cm.conversation_id = messages.conversation_id) AND (cm.user_id = auth.uid())))))

policy_name: Author can manage tags on own post
using_expression:
(EXISTS ( SELECT 1
   FROM posts
  WHERE ((posts.id = post_tags.post_id) AND (posts.author_id = auth.uid()))))
